fields.description:
Hello,

The login expiration for Studio/CLI is annoyingly short, and I feel like my builds and workflow are unnecessarily interrupted more than it really should.  

I think if you log out of Studio, then you have to log back in.  Suggestion to remove expiration of login.

Thanks
fields.summary: Request to lengthen/remove CLI/Studio Login Expiration date

comments.body: Hello, Studio login expiration time can be extend unto 7 days. To do that log out from the studio by clicking on your name at the bottom left corner, and click yes. After reopening studio put your credentials and click "remember for 7 days". This should help you extend the studio login expiration time. Thanks.
